downloadTitle: Microsoft Chart Controls for Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5
downloadDescription: ASP.NET and Windows Forms Chart Controls for .NET Framework 3.5 SP1
detailsSection:
Microsoft Chart Controls for Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 will install new assemblies that contain the ASP.NET and Windows Forms Chart Controls.

Distribution of MSChart.exe: Use of MSChart.exe is subject to the license terms included in the “MSChart.exe” download file. Those terms do not include rights to distribute MSChart.exe. If you wish to distribute MSChart.exe with your programs, you must:

  • Download the above “Supplemental Redist License.docx” and review the enclosed Microsoft Software Supplemental License Terms for Microsoft Chart Controls for Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 with additional use terms for Distributable Code (Supplemental Terms). Distribution of MSChart.exe is subject to these Supplemental Terms.
  • Print and retain a copy of the Supplemental Terms for your records
  • If you do not agree to the Supplemental Terms enclosed in the “Supplemental Redist License.docx”, you do not have any rights under the Supplemental Terms.
systemRequirementsSection:
• .NET Framework: .NET Framework 3.5 SP1
  • Processor: 400 MHz Pentium processor or equivalent (Minimum); 1GHz Pentium processor or equivalent (Recommended)
  • RAM:96 MB (Minimum); 256 MB (Recommended)
  • Hard Disk: Up to 500 MB of available space may be required
  • CD or DVD Drive: Not required
  • Display: 800 x 600, 256 colors (Minimum); 1024 x 768 high color, 32-bit (Recommended)
installInstructionSection:
1. Important: Make sure you have the latest service pack and critical updates for the version of Windows on the computer. To look for recent updates, visit Windows Update.

  2. Before you can install this download, make sure that Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 is installed on the computer.

  3. Click the Download button on this page to start the download

  4. To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.

  5. To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
